mapper.select: select e.id as id, e.no as no, e.host_id as host_id, e.url as url, e.scratch_time as scratch_time, e.status as status, a.id as anime_id, a.name as anime_name from anime_episode_scratch e, anime a where e.anime_id = #{anime.id} and e.scratch_time > #{time} and e.anime_id = a.id;
select count(*) from anime_episode_scratch where status = #{status}
